remarks: Deduction eliminating disjunct. _Notational convention_:  We sometimes suffix with "s" the label of an inference that manipulates an antecedent, leaving the consequent unchanged.  The "s" means that the inference eliminates the need for a syllogism ( ~ syl ) -type inference in a proof.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1994.)
statement:
orcs.1 $e |- ( ( ph \/ ps ) -> ch ) $.
orcs $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
